com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js

Class MIDIPerformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js.MIDIPerformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class MIDIPerformer
extends Object
implements Runnable
    You can play a single Sequence,Track, or Score with play. Or, you can add them, then call start to play them in order.
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa

      • add

        public MIDIPerformer add(Sequence sequence)
        To play multiple Sequences in order. Add them, then start the Performer.
        Parameters:
        sequence - the JavaSound Sequence
        Returns:
        this to cascade calls
